timeline.bodyText: @thomasdarimont As you pointed, you are missing cleanup of those things after the test method.
timeline.author: mposolda

timeline.bodyText: I guess this probably worth cleanup as well.
timeline.author: mposolda

replies.bodyText: Another test changed the email to something else... I now reset the email of the user in before to ensure, that we always start from the same state.
replies.author: thomasdarimont
